title.rendered: BC PNP Latest Draw February 22, 2023 ~ 246 Invitations

Share Tweet Share Pin
[vc_column_text]British Columbia announced the Latest BC PNP Draw results on February 22, 2022, and invited nearly 246 candidates under the  BC PNP Skills Immigration and Express Entry BC Streams. The province invited 203 applicants in the General BC PNP categories and around 43 candidates across the targeted categories.

  • Draw Date: February 22, 2023
  • No. of invitations: ~ 246
  • BC PNP Stream: Skills Immigration
  • Minimum Score: Ranging from 60-103

In 2023, British Columbia issued 1,613 invitations under the BC PNP streams.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”Start Your Free BC PNP Assessment” url=”https://bit.ly/start-free-assessment”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP Latest Draw: General Category” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669814351916{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1677217354793{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”]British Columbia issued 203 invitations with minimum SIRS scores between 60-103 depending on the programs. The minimum scores for the individual categories are mentioned below:

Date Number of
Invitations		 Stream Minimum
Score		 Description
February 22, 2023 203 BC PNP Skilled Worker 101 General draw
(includes tech occupations)
Express Entry BC Skilled Worker 101
International Graduate 103
Express Entry BC International Graduate 103
Entry Level and Semi-Skilled Category (ELSS) 85
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1677219929890{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

BC PNP Latest Targeted Draw

The province of British Columbia runs targeted draws for candidates who meet certain in-demand National Occupational Classifications (NOCs) standards, such as those in technology, healthcare and other priority occupations.

Targeted draws might not require as high SIRS scores compared to general draws. This week, SIRS scores of 60 were required for each targeted category. BC invited the following applicants to their intended draws:

Number of Invitations Category Minimum Score Description/ Targeted Draw NOC TEER Code
18 Skilled Worker, International Graduate (includes EEBC option) 60 Childcare: Early childhood educators and assistants 42202
20 Skilled Worker, International Graduate (includes EEBC option) 60 Healthcare
<5 Skilled Worker, International Graduate (includes EEBC option) 60 Targeted Draw: Other Priority Occupations 31103, 32104

margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP Skills Immigration Categories” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669814791596{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]High-skilled foreign employees from all over the world are welcome to work in British Columbia thanks to BC PNP Skills Immigration Stream. It frequently accepts these applicants and includes BC PNP categories including:

  • BC PNP Tech
  • BC PNP Skilled Worker
  • BC PNP Health Authority
  • BC PNP Semi-Skilled
  • BC PNP International Graduate
  • BC PNP International Post-Graduate
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

What is Express Entry BC Stream?

The province of British Columbia looks through the IRCC’s Express Entry pool to discover applicants who are eligible for one of the Express Entry BC Streams. Under the BC PNP, the province frequently selects and welcomes foreign employees, students, and businesses. Applicants who take part in the EEBC stream will receive 600 more CRS points.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Need help?” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1655824044795{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]If you are prepared to start the BC PNP process, you can get immigration advice from Team COLOSSUS’s experienced immigration consultants. As a Licensed Canadian Immigration Consultant, Mr. Keshav Sharma has knowledge of all BC PNP Programs (RCIC).

excerpt.rendered: British Columbia held General and Targeted draws of BC PNP on February 22, 2023. The BC PNP Latest Draw invited nearly 246 candidates with scores ranging from 60 to 103.
